OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD MIND AND BODY PROJECT, THE

Desc.entry: A health and wellbeing project, managed by Sheffield Mind, that works with people to improve physical and emotional wellbeing, whilst tackling stigma and promoting social inclusion. Participation is open to anyone aged 16 years or over but will particularly target those who experience difficulties with their physical and emotional needs. The project works mainly in the Manor and Flower Estates and surrounding areas, where participants can take part in activity sessions, support groups, healthy living workshops and access one-to-one mentoring. The service provides a free creche for parents wanting to access the project and free transport to anyone with a mobility requirement. Sheffield Mind is a registered charity. Self or any referral.
